title: Xi Jinping: 2025 was a year of AI and chip breakthroughs amid US-China tech rivalry
description: Chinese President Xi Jinping said 2025 was the year of breakthroughs for Chinese artificial intelligence and semiconductor chip companies. What did they accomplish and what can we expect in 2026?
content:
Chinese President Xi Jinping said 2025 was the year that China’s technologies, including artificial intelligence and semiconductor chips, “reached new heights”.

title: India to set agenda for Global South through AI Summit
description: The India–AI Impact Summit 2026 will be held in New Delhi on February 19–20, marking the first global artificial intelligence summit hosted in the Global South. With participation from 100 countries, the event aims to position India as a key voice in shaping AI priorities for developing economies, with a focus on inclusive growth, social development and people-centric innovation.

title: Why Do Americans Hate A.I.?
description: We look at the uniquely American animosity toward artificial intelligence.

title: EPA helping AI industry grow but ignoring technology's power to protect environment
description: Agency must use artificial intelligence to defend communities with same zeal it applies to cutting protections that safeguard them
content:

title: 2026 Trading Kickoff: Wall Street Bounces Back
description: U.S. stock index futures rose on the first trading day of 2026 after declines at 2025's end. Wall Street saw continued gains throughout 2025, driven by artificial intelligence stocks. Despite late-year declines, futures showed promise as heavyweight stocks stabilized. Analysts caution against relying on a positive start as an indicator for the year.
content: In a promising start to 2026 trading, U.S. stock index futures advanced, signaling a recovery after the previous week's declines. Wall Street, which enjoyed strong gains in 2025, spurred by high demand for artificial intelligence stocks, faced a brie... [810 chars]
